segments.text: Oh , Mary , come in , please . I'm so happy to see you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Happy birthday , George . Many happy returns of the day . Here's a present for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , thank you , Mary . You're so nice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope you like it . Oh , have the other guys arrived ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They're all waiting for you . Let's join them . I'm going to cut the cake soon .
segments.speaker: S1
